baselines.name: Deep Learning (DL)
baselines.description: Deep learning model for entity resolution using deepmatcher library.

baselines.name: Deep Active Learning (DAL)
baselines.description: Active learning framework with deep models (random initialization).

baselines.name: Support Vector Machine (SVM)
baselines.description: Non-deep learning baseline using SVM algorithm from Magellan package.

baselines.name: Decision Tree
baselines.description: Non-deep learning baseline from Magellan package.

baselines.name: Random Forest
baselines.description: Non-deep learning baseline from Magellan package.

baselines.name: Naive Bayes
baselines.description: Non-deep learning baseline from Magellan package.

baselines.name: Logistic Regression
baselines.description: Non-deep learning baseline from Magellan package.

baselines.name: Linear Regression
baselines.description: Non-deep learning baseline from Magellan package.

baselines.name: Mudgal et al. (2018)
baselines.description: State-of-the-art deep learning method for entity resolution.

baselines.name: Ditto
baselines.description: PLM-based entity resolution using RoBerta and fine-tuning on labeled pairs.

baselines.name: JointBert
baselines.description: Dual-objective BERT model combining binary matching and multi-class classification for entity matching.

baselines.name: RobEM
baselines.description: Robust PLM-based ER method addressing data imbalance with modifications to enhance PLMs.

baselines.name: ManualPrompt
baselines.description: LLM-based ER (GPT-3) using manually designed prompts and demonstrations; standard prompting.

baselines.name: DM+
baselines.description: DeepMatcher+, a reference DL-based EM approach that does not rely on a transformer architecture.

baselines.name: Ditto
baselines.description: A BERT-based EM approach with data augmentation techniques and advanced EM data encoding.

baselines.name: ZeroER
baselines.description: Unsupervised, generative ER approach using Gaussian Mixture Models

baselines.name: EMBDI
baselines.description: Unsupervised, learns local embeddings for ER based on attribute-centric graphs

baselines.name: DeepMatcher+ (DM+)
baselines.description: Supervised, implements multiple ER methods and reports best F1-scores

baselines.name: GraphER
baselines.description: Supervised, integrates schematic and structural information with GNN for ER

baselines.name: MCA
baselines.description: Supervised, uses attention mechanism in sequence-based model for ER

baselines.name: ERGAN
baselines.description: Supervised, generative adversarial network for label augmentation in ER

baselines.name: DITTO
baselines.description: Supervised, pre-trained Transformer-based language model for ER as sentence-pair classification

baselines.name: DITTO-S
baselines.description: DITTO using pseudo labels generated by CollaborER's ALG

baselines.name: CollaborEM
baselines.description: Unsupervised framework that constructs rule-based pseudo labels and combines graph and sentence features.

baselines.name: DITTO
baselines.description: Supervised ER model; fine-tunes a pre-trained language model for sentence-pair classification.

baselines.name: DTAL
baselines.description: Iterative active-learning-based entity matching method allocating annotation budget to informative pairs.

baselines.name: DITTO-full
baselines.description: DITTO trained with the full training data of the processed Magellan datasets.

baselines.name: LLaMA-65B
baselines.description: Large language model (65B) with 10-shot in-context learning.

baselines.name: GPT3-175B
baselines.description: Large language model (175B parameters) with 10-shot in-context learning.

baselines.name: SBERT
baselines.description: Pre-trained SBERT used as a blocker.

baselines.name: DeepBlocker
baselines.description: Blocker baseline for candidate generation.

baselines.name: Sudowoodo
baselines.description: Blocker baseline for candidate generation.

baselines.name: Booster
baselines.description: LLM-based ER method employing traditional blocking and iterative partition scoring.

baselines.name: BQ
baselines.description: Batch-Questioning: Batches pairwise match questions into a single prompt for LLMs.

baselines.name: CrowdER+LLM
baselines.description: Clustering-based design that filters irrelevant pairs and uses LLM to cluster ambiguous cases.

baselines.name: DeepMatcher
baselines.description: Entity matching framework using RNNs to aggregate attribute values

baselines.name: BERT
baselines.description: Fine-tuned for entity matching as a sequence pair classification task

baselines.name: SentenceBERT
baselines.description: Siamese architecture for pretrained LMs for sentence/entity matching

baselines.name: Ditto
baselines.description: State-of-the-art EM approach using pre-trained LM with domain knowledge, TF-IDF summarization, and data augmentation

baselines.name: DADER
baselines.description: Transfer learning-based EM framework via domain adaptation

baselines.name: Rotom
baselines.description: Meta-learning framework for data selection/weighting to better fine-tune LMs

baselines.name: TDmatch
baselines.description: Unsupervised approach using graph creation and random walk for structured/text data

baselines.name: TDmatch*
baselines.description: TDmatch embeddings with an MLP classifier in supervised setting

baselines.name: Autoencoder
baselines.description: Deep learning (DL) based blocker; one of the two best DL blockers.

baselines.name: Hybrid
baselines.description: Deep learning based blocker; one of the two best DL blockers.

baselines.name: Union(DL,RBB)
baselines.description: Combination of the best DL blocker and RBB, a SOTA industrial blocker.

baselines.name: PBW
baselines.description: SOTA hash blocker from JedAI open-source platform.

baselines.name: DBW
baselines.description: SOTA hash blocker from JedAI open-source platform.

baselines.name: JD
baselines.description: SOTA hash blocker from JedAI open-source platform.

baselines.name: kNN-cosine
baselines.description: kNN blocker using cosine similarity over 5-gram tokenization.

baselines.name: kNN-jaccard
baselines.description: kNN blocker using Jaccard similarity over 3-gram and 5-gram tokenization.

baselines.name: BCI
baselines.description: Binary classifier for weight-based supervised meta-blocking

baselines.name: CEP
baselines.description: Cardinality-based pruning algorithm

baselines.name: CNP
baselines.description: Cardinality-based pruning algorithm

baselines.name: Supervised Meta-blocking
baselines.description: Original supervised meta-blocking framework using BCI and CNP with the feature set proposed in [25]

baselines.name: PairedFixed
baselines.description: Non-adaptive blocking: candidate set via similarity search on pretrained TPLM embeddings; no task-specific finetuning

baselines.name: PairedAdapt
baselines.description: Embeddings from TPLM as finetuned by the matcher in paired mode; candidate set created as in PairedFixed

baselines.name: SentenceBERT
baselines.description: Finetunes TPLM and a SentenceBERT-like classifier on labeled data to obtain embeddings for similarity search; RoBERTa transformer used in this work

baselines.name: Rules
baselines.description: Blocking based on hand-crafted rules (human-designed), applied to five benchmark datasets

baselines.name: Random Forest
baselines.description: Ensemble of 20 decision trees using learner-aware Query By Committee (QBC); strong active learning baseline for entity resolution

baselines.name: JedAI:Schema-based
baselines.description: JedAI toolkit schema-based pipeline; similarity joins for blocking; best configuration per [47]

baselines.name: JedAI:Schema-agnostic
baselines.description: JedAI toolkit schema-agnostic pipeline; leverages all attributes to extract overlapping blocks; best configuration per [47]

baselines.name: PairedFixed (MultiLingual)
baselines.description: Non-adaptive blocking for MultiLingual dataset; candidate set via similarity search on pretrained multilingual BERT embeddings

baselines.name: PairedAdapt (MultiLingual)
baselines.description: Adaptive blocking for MultiLingual dataset; embeddings from multilingual BERT as finetuned by the matcher in paired mode

baselines.name: SiGMa
baselines.description: State-of-the-art entity resolution method.

baselines.name: LINDA
baselines.description: State-of-the-art entity resolution method.

baselines.name: RiMOM
baselines.description: State-of-the-art entity resolution method.

baselines.name: PARIS
baselines.description: State-of-the-art entity resolution method.

baselines.name: BSL
baselines.description: Custom heavily fine-tuned baseline using value similarity and Unique Mapping Clustering; disregards neighbor evidence.

baselines.name: RBB
baselines.description: State-of-the-art industrial non-DL solution that uses labeled data to learn a blocker

baselines.name: BSL
baselines.description: Blocking Scheme Learner; learns a blocker from labeled data

baselines.name: TB
baselines.description: Token Blocking; unsupervised schema-agnostic approach

baselines.name: AutoBlock
baselines.description: DL method that learns tuple embeddings using labeled data and LSH for retrieval

baselines.name: DeepER
baselines.description: Existing DL solution for blocking

baselines.name: DeepBlock
baselines.description: Existing DL solution; marginally uses DL to improve a non-DL blocking solution

baselines.name: Graphix-base
baselines.description: Baseline text-to-SQL model using schema linking via string matching.

baselines.name: Graphix-TransE
baselines.description: Graphix-base model with TransE-based schema linking.

baselines.name: Graphix-GCN
baselines.description: Graphix-base model with GCN-based schema linking.

baselines.name: Levenshtein distance
baselines.description: Edit distance metric for string similarity

baselines.name: Affine gap distance
baselines.description: Edit distance metric with different penalties for gaps

baselines.name: Jaccard-Word
baselines.description: Tokenizes strings into sets of words and computes the Jaccard score

baselines.name: Jaccard-NG
baselines.description: Creates n-grams (3-grams) for strings and computes Jaccard score over n-gram sets

baselines.name: pkduck
baselines.description: Synonym rules-based approach for string matching

baselines.name: Bipartite
baselines.description: Set similarity approach using a bipartite graph; similarity is minimal sum of edge weights divided by number of edges; edge weights evaluated with Jaccard-NG

baselines.name: ChatGPT (GPT-4.0)
baselines.description: Large language model-based approach to string matching
